name: The Gate Keeper
description:
The Gate Keeper is a platformer that is very early in development. New content will be added regularly every week or so. 

Suggestions and feedback are welcome below in the comments!

Controls:

  • Keyboard
    • Movement: Arrow Keys
    • Jump: Space or Arrow Up
    • Action: C
    • Throw: X
  • Controller
    • Movement: D-Pad
    • Jump: A
    • Action: Y
    • Throw: X
